meanings.definition: Beyond the range of what is perceptible by the senses.
meanings.sent1: The idea of ghosts is supersensible because they cannot be seen or touched.
meanings.sent2: The concept of time travel is often described as supersensible.
meanings.sent3: It's like trying to catch a cloud - completely supersensible!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was a supersensible force, invisible yet powerful.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset was so supersensible that it seemed almost magical.

meanings.definition: Not able to be perceived by the physical senses.
meanings.sent1: The scent of a distant flower was supersensible to her nose.
meanings.sent2: The sound of a dog whistle is supersensible to human ears.
meanings.sent3: His ability to predict the future seemed almost supersensible.
meanings.sent4: The bond between the twins was supersensible, like an unbreakable thread.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the exotic fruit was so supersensible that it left her craving more.

meanings.definition: Existing beyond the realm of the physical world.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of a supersensible realm where mythical creatures dwell.
meanings.sent2: The idea of parallel universes is a supersensible concept.
meanings.sent3: His excuse for being late was so supersensible that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams often took her to a supersensible world filled with wonders.
meanings.sent5: The painting depicted a supersensible landscape that seemed to transcend reality.
